properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5
properties.shortDescription: Well-presented three-bedroom family home in a popular residential area.
properties.longDescription: This well-presented three-bedroom house offers spacious living accommodation ideal for families. The property benefits from a modern fitted kitchen, a large living room with garden access, and three well-proportioned bedrooms upstairs. Located close to transport links, schools, and local amenities.

properties.shortDescription: Modern two-bedroom garden flat in excellent condition.
properties.longDescription: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout, this modern two-bedroom garden flat features an open-plan kitchen and living area with integrated appliances. Bi-folding doors lead to a private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are doubles, and the property includes a family bathroom and separate wet room.

properties.shortDescription: Spacious four-bedroom detached house with large garden.
properties.longDescription: This spacious four-bedroom detached house offers a modern kitchen, separate dining area, and generous living space throughout. The property includes a large private garden, garage, and driveway parking for multiple vehicles, making it ideal for growing families.

properties.shortDescription: Modern one-bedroom flat with balcony and city views.
properties.longDescription: This modern one-bedroom flat offers bright and well-proportioned accommodation with a private balcony and attractive views. Ideally located on the High Street, the property is within walking distance of shops, restaurants, and excellent transport links.

properties.shortDescription: Luxury five-bedroom family home with swimming pool.
properties.longDescription: This luxury five-bedroom detached family home offers exceptional living space, including a high-end kitchen, swimming pool, home office, and large landscaped garden. The property also benefits from a garage and ample off-street parking.

This modern two-bedroom riverside apartment offers stylish interiors, a private balcony, and allocated parking. Situated close to local schools, green spaces, and transport links, it is ideal for professionals and small families.

This charming three-bedroom semi-detached house features a bright conservatory, private garden, and garage. Located in a quiet residential area, the property is ideal for families seeking a balance of comfort and convenience.
